processes.name: Create Group
processes.description: Create a security group that will deny all traffic except the ssh port.

params.value: This group was created in order to leave only one open port - 22 and prohibit other traffic.
params.name: description

params.value: Snapshot was taken due to a security trigger
params.name: description

processes.name: Report
processes.description: Create an incident in Pager Duty with a link to the logs.

processes.name: Trigger to Get Instance
processes.description: Here I take my instance, but for the task, the instance ID must be assigned from the monitoring system.

processes.name: Attach Rules
processes.description: Attach Permissions to an Instance. To complete this step, we need to add the "modify-instance-attribute" method to EC2 in Kaholo.

processes.name: Get Logs
processes.description: Get logs and store them in S3. Download your application logs, also sshd (auth.log for example), systems (sys.log) and other system logs that may help with the investigation.

processes.name: Create AWS Config
processes.description: This is a simple bash script that writes the keys from aws to the credentials file.
